ratings.comment: He is very unprofessional and give poor feedback. He does care a lot about students and know a lot about the material, but is not a good teacher. You have to learn how to write what he wants exactly to do well. Take every suggestion he gives you. His feedback is hard to follow. He also speaks in a way that can be offensive, so be prepared for that.
If you don't write like Mike, you will not pass this class. Whatever you have learned about writing, it is all wrong in the eyes of Mike. You have a to be a good debater if you want a good grade.

While I did learn a lot from this class and improved my writing abilities greatly, I don't know if it was because of Mike. While I enjoyed him as a person, I didn't feel he gave great feedback on writing assignments. The writing assignments are challenging in that you must learn to write like articles in a newspaper. Improvement matters.

I learned a lot from this class. I was skeptical about the class but Mike proved to be an insightful and passionate teacher, and I loved the class. Put in the work and show improvement and you'll get an A
Mike is a great professor. Overall if you try in the course you will receive an A. He just wants to see improvement and a good work ethic.

Really sharp instructor. Has a passion for journalism and for improving the writing of his students. Mike challenges you and will force you to work and be present in class, but that is his job.  Not a difficult choice if you do the work.

He's a great teacher, really passionate and knowledgeable.  He cares about his students and their success.  He brings real world advice and experience to the class and even takes us out of the classroom to give us that practice.  It may be a hard class, but you come out a better writer!

I loved him. He was the first teacher to actually swear at us, heh. He's really passionate about what he does, and it rubs off. He also really cares about your improvement. I also enjoyed the individual coffee meet-ups to talk about how you're doing in the class. Can come off as a bit rough.

As noted by other rating, can be a scary teacher especially when in a small class and you can't hide. Can be harsh with mistakes, otherwise he is a quite good teacher, he'll make you a better writer. He does go out of his way to organize press conferences etc, so I'm glad I learnt from him.
Very helpful and very passionate about the subject. Has an amazing amount of real world experience, take him if you can!
